text: Lasianthus rhinophyllus is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Lasianthus rhinophyllus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Lasianthus rhinophyllus
